duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and assist customers in a fast-paced food service environment, handling cash transactions and processing orders.
Work the drive-thru and manage order processing efficiently and accurately.
Fill drink orders and ensure customer satisfaction with the service.
Maintain cleanliness of the restaurant, including cleaning tables, floors, and other areas.
Take initiative and work as part of a team to ensure smooth operations during shifts.
Adhere to food safety procedures and follow proper safety protocols when handling food.
